title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe an ideological perspective on the policy issue in the scenario. The response must include a reference to the policy issue or content in the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how the perspective on the issue described in part A affects political parties in Congress. The response must include reference to the policy issue or content in the scenario.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how a major political event, such as the effects of the recession that began in 2008, could influence attitudes in the context of the scenario.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
